icon.description: To set the icon type of the avatar, refer to the Icon component
icon.description_zh: 设置头像的图标类型，参考 Icon 组件

size.description: Set the size of your avatar

shape.description: Set the shape of your avatar

src.description: The resource address of the image avatar

srcSet.description: A comma-separated list of one or more strings indicates a range of possible images used by the user agent
srcSet.description_zh: 以逗号分隔的一个或多个字符串列表表明一系列用户代理使用的可能的图像

alt.description: Alt text that describes the image

fit.description: When the display type is set to Image, set how the image fits into the container box
fit.description_zh: 当展示类型为图片的时候，设置图片如何适应容器框

:error.description: If the image avatar fails to load, returning false will disable the default fallback behavior of the component
:error.description_zh: 图片类头像加载失败的回调， 返回 false 会关闭组件默认的 fallback 行为
